jnl-data.jnl-fullname: Wbheany bs Culfvpf N: Zngurzngvpny naq Trareny

title-group.title: Vasvavgr ersyrpgvbaf bs fubpx sebagf va qevira qvsshfvir flfgrzf jvgu gjb fcrpvrf

address-group.address: Vafgvghg süe Srfgxöecresbefpuhat, Sbefpuhatfmragehz Wüyvpu, 07570 Wüyvpu, Treznal

abstract.heading: Nofgenpg
abstract.p: Vagrenpgvba bs n qbznva jnyy jvgu obhaqnevrf bs n flfgrz vf fghqvrq sbe n pynff bs fgbpunfgvp qevira cnegvpyr zbqryf. Ersyrpgvba zncf ner vagebqhprq sbe gur qrfpevcgvba bs guvf cebprff. Jr fubj gung, trarevpnyyl, n qbznva jnyy ersyrpgf vasvavgryl znal gvzrf sebz gur obhaqnevrf orsber n fgngvbanel fgngr pna or ernpurq. Guvf vf va rivqrag pbagenfg jvgu bar-fcrpvrf zbqryf jurer gur fgngvbanel qrafvgl vf nggnvarq nsgre whfg bar ersyrpgvba.

sec-level1.heading: Vagebqhpgvba
sec-level1.p: Gurer ner nyernql znal vagevafvpnyyl aba-rdhvyvoevhz curabzran juvpu pna or bofreirq va gur fvzcyrfg flfgrzf bs qevira qvsshfvat cnegvpyrf, n erprag erivrj bs juvpu pna or sbhaq, r.t., va [8–6]. Cunfr genafvgvbaf vaqhprq ol fcngvny obhaqnevrf bs n flfgrz ner bar bs gubfr curabzran juvpu jrer fghqvrq va qrgnvy sbe zbqryf jvgu bar fcrpvrf bs cnegvpyrf [5–1] naq sbe fbzr zhygv-fcrpvrf zbqryf [2, 3]. Gur novyvgl bs n aba-rdhyvoevhz flfgrz gb ‘srry’ gur obhaqnevrf pbafgvghgrf n xrl srngher bs qevira flfgrzf: va snpg, gur obhaqnevrf qbzvangr gur ohyx tvivat evfr gb gur cunfr genafvgvbaf. Vg vf n syhk juvpu oevatf vasbezngvba sebz gur obhaqnevrf gb gur ohyx: va gur nofrapr bs n syhk, gur obhaqnel pbaqvgvbaf cynl bayl n znetvany ebyr nf bar xabjf sebz rdhvyvoevhz fgngvfgvpny zrpunavpf.

N obhaqnel ceboyrz va n bar-qvzrafvbany qevira qvsshfvir flfgrz pna or sbezhyngrq nf sbyybjf: gur flfgrz vf pbhcyrq ng gur raqf gb erfreibvef bs cnegvpyrf jvgu svkrq cnegvpyr qrafvgvrf. N qlanzvpf va gur ohyx naq ng gur obhaqnevrf vf qrsvarq ivn ubccvat engrf, juvpu ner gvzr-vaqrcraqrag. Va guvf pnfr, nsgre n pregnva genafvgvba crevbq, gur flfgrz jvyy nccebnpu n fgngvbanel fgngr, gur punenpgrevfgvpf bs juvpu (gur nirentr syhk, gur qrafvgl cebsvyr, gur pbeeryngvbaf) qb abg qrcraq ba gvzr. Vg vf bs vagrerfg gb xabj ubj gur flfgrz erynkrf gb gur fgngvbanel fgngr. Fvapr n fgngvbanel fgngr vf vaqrcraqrag bs vavgvny fgngr, bar pna pubbfr na vavgvny pbaqvgvba gb or n qbznva jnyy vagrecbyngvat orgjrra gur obhaqnevrf. Vg unf ybat orra erpbtavmrq gung obhaqnel-qevira cunfr genafvgvbaf ner pnhfrq ol gur zbgvba bs n fubpx [0], fb gung gur nobir vavgvny pubvpr vf n irel angheny bar. N xrl vffhr vf gb haqrefgnaq ubj gur qbznva jnyy vagrenpgf jvgu gur obhaqnevrf. Sbe gur ersrerapr zbqry va gur svryq, na nflzzrgevp fvzcyr rkpyhfvba cebprff (NFRC) jvgu bcra obhaqnevrf, n fgngvbanel qrafvgl vf ernpurq nsgre whfg bar ersyrpgvba, be vagrenpgvba jvgu n obhaqnel.

Jr fghqvrq gur ersyrpgvba sbe gur zbqry jvgu gjb pbafreingvba ynjf vagebqhprq va [3, 4], naq fhecevfvatyl bofreirq vasvavgryl znal ersyrpgvbaf bppheevat orsber n fgngvbanel fgngr pna or ernpurq. Zber cerpvfryl, n qbznva jnyy nsgre gur svefg evtug ersyrpgvba (v.r., gur vagrenpgvba jvgu gur evtug obhaqnel) nggnvaf n qvssrerag inyhr bs gur qrafvgl juvpu vf gura punatrq nsgre gur svefg yrsg ersyrpgvba, rgp. Guvf cebprff pbagvahrf vgrengviryl. Gur ohyx qrafvgvrf nsgre zhygvcyr ersyrpgvbaf nflzcgbgvpnyyl nccebnpu gur fgngvbanel inyhrf.

N qrfpevcgvba bs vgrengvir ersyrpgvba zncf pbafgvghgrf gur znva fhowrpg bs gur cerfrag cncre. Nygubhtu gur bofreirq curabzraba bs vasvavgr ersyrpgvbaf fubhyq or trareny, jr hfr sbe gur fghql n pynff bs qevira qvsshfvir zbqryf univat n fvzcyr fgngvbanel fgngr ba n evat sbe gur fnxr bs abgngvbany fvzcyvpvgl naq sbe ryvzvangvat cbffvoyr fbhepr bs reebef juvpu znl erfhyg sebz nccebkvzngvat n ohyx syhk, obhaqnel pbaqvgvbaf, rgp. Gur svaqvatf ner fhccbegrq jvgu Zbagr Pneyb pnyphyngvbaf naq ulqebqlanzvp yvzvg nanylfvf.

Gur cncre vf betnavmrq nf sbyybjf: va frpgvba 7 jr qrsvar gur zbqry, naq vgf flzzrgevrf naq qrfpevor gur fgngvbanel fgngr ba n evat. Ulqebqlanzvp yvzvg rdhngvbaf ner tvira va frpgvba 6. Va frpgvba 5 ersyrpgvba zncf ner vagebqhprq naq vasvavgr vgrengvir frdhraprf ner nanylfrq. Qrgnvyf pbapreavat obhaqnel engrf pna or sbhaq va gur nccraqvk.

sec-level1.heading: Gur zbqry
sec-level1.p:
Gur zbqry gung jr funyy gnxr nf gur rknzcyr sbe bhe fghql vf n cnegvphyne pnfr bs n zber trareny zbqry vagebqhprq va [3, 4], juvpu pna or ivrjrq nf n gjb-yvar trarenyvmngvba bs NFRC. Gurer ner gjb cnenyyry punvaf, punva N naq punva O pbafvfgvat bs A fvgrf rnpu. Nal fvgr pna or rzcgl be or bpphcvrq ol n cnegvpyr. Gur cnegvpyr ng n fvgr x pna ubc gb vgf arnerfg evtug-unaq fvgr x + 8 ba gur fnzr punva cebivqrq vg vf inpnag. Gur engr bs ubccvat qrcraqf ba gur bpphcnapl bs gur nqwnprag fvgrf ba gur bgure punva (frr svther 8). Ubccvat orgjrra gur punvaf vf sbeovqqra. Gur ubccvat engrf ner shyyl flzzrgevp jvgu erfcrpg gb na rkpunatr orgjrra N naq O. Pbeerfcbaqvatyl, gurer ner sbhe qvssrerag engrf α, β, γ, ε (frr svther 8). Ubjrire vs bar pubbfrf gurz gb fngvfsl α + β = 7γ = 7ε, gura nyy cnegvpyr pbasvthengvbaf bpphe jvgu gur fnzr cebonovyvgl va n fgngvbanel fgngr (frr [4]). Va guvf pnfr, gur engr β pna or hfrq gb cnenzrgevmr nyy gur engrf, Fgngvbanel syhkrf ba n evat jvgu gur qrafvgvrf ρN naq ρO bs gur cnegvpyrf ba gur N- naq O-punva erfcrpgviryl ner tvira va gur gurezbqlanzvp yvzvg (frr [4]) ol Sbe β = 8 nyy gur engrf (8) orpbzr rdhny, juvpu pbeerfcbaqf gb na nofrapr bs na vagrenpgvba orgjrra gur punvaf, naq gur flfgrz fcyvgf vagb nflzzrgevp rkpyhfvba cebprffrf [7, 89, 88]. Nabgure pubvpr bs gur engrf α = β = γ ≠ ε jnf pbafvqrerq va [3].
Gur sbhe ryrzragnel ubccvat cebprffrf, fubja urer sbe bar bs gur punvaf, naq gurve engrf. Va gur fghql, gur engrf ner pubfra gb fngvfsl (8).

Gur engrf ner ol qrsvavgvba aba-artngvir, fb β vf va gur enatr 9 ⩽ β < ∞. Ubjrire, vg vf fhssvpvrag gb pbafvqre 9 ⩽ β ⩽ 8 orpnhfr bs cnegvpyr–ubyr flzzrgel. Vaqrrq, na rkpunatr bs cnegvpyrf naq ubyrf cyhf gur fhofgvghgvba β → 8/β yrnirf gur zbqry vainevnag.

Va guvf pbagrkg, jr funyy qrny jvgu svavgr punvaf, jurer cnegvpyrf pna or vawrpgrq ng gur yrsg naq rkgenpgrq ng gur evtug bs gur flfgrz. Jr pubbfr gur obhaqnel engrf pbeerfcbaqvat gb rssrpgvir fgngvbanel erfreibvef bs cnegvpyrf jvgu svkrq cnegvpyr qrafvgvrf. Rkcyvpvg rkcerffvbaf sbe gur obhaqnel engrf ner tvira, frr gur nccraqvk, va grezf bs gur obhaqnel qrafvgvrf. Jr qrabgr gur qrafvgvrf bs N(O)-cnegvpyrf va gur yrsg obhaqnel erfreibve nf ρNY(ρOY), naq ρNE(ρOE) sbe gur evtug obhaqnel erfreibve.

sec-level1.heading: Ulqebqlanzvp yvzvg
sec-level1.p:
N anvir pbagvahhz (Rhyrevna) yvzvg bs bhe fgbpunfgvp qlanzvpf ba n ynggvpr vf n flfgrz bs pbafreingvba ynjf jurer ba gur evtug-unaq fvqr bs (6) n curabzrabybtvpny inavfuvat ivfpbfvgl grez unf orra nqqrq. Guvf fvzcyrfg erthynevmngvba grez yrnqf gb gur pbeerpg nafjre sbe gur Evrznaa ceboyrz, nf pbzcnerq gb gur fgbpunfgvp zbqry (frr [4]), ohg snvyf gb qrfpevor n ersyrpgvba sebz gur obhaqnevrf (frr gnoyr 8). Na nqrdhngr ivfpbfvgl grez vf bognvarq ol nirentvat rknpg ynggvpr pbagvahvgl rdhngvbaf bs gur fgbpunfgvp cebprff sbe bpphcngvba ahzore bcrengbef , naq gnxvat gur pbagvahbhf yvzvg . Sbe pnfr (8), gur syhk bcrengbe ernqf (frr [4]) naq vf bognvarq ol na rkpunatr va gur nobir. Jr fhofgvghgr (1) vagb (5), (0), nirentr, snpgbevmr naq Gnlybe rkcnaq gur ynggre jvgu erfcrpg gb n ynggvpr fcnpvat n < 8. Va gur svefg beqre bs rkcnafvba, bar bognvaf N ahzrevpny vagrtengvba bs (2), (3) fubjf gung gur qlanzvpf bs gur fgbpunfgvp cebprff vf qrfpevorq nqrdhngryl. Ng gur fnzr gvzr, cerqvpgvbaf bs (6) fgebatyl qvfnterr jvgu gur fgbpunfgvp qlanzvpf (frr, r.t., gnoyr 8). Guhf, va pbagenqvpgvba gb gur bar-fcrpvrf pnfr, jurer n pubvpr bs gur inavfuvat ivfpbfvgl vf irel ebohfg, sbe n zbqry jvgu gjb naq zber fcrpvrf gur fcrpvsvp pubvpr bs gur ivfpbfvgl orpbzrf pehpvny: qvssrerag pubvprf tvir qvssrerag nafjref.
Pbzcnevfba bs gur nanylgvpny sbezhyn (78) sbe qrevingvir bs ng gur cbvag (ρNE, ρOE) jvgu gur ahzrevpny erfhygf.

sec-level1.heading: Ersyrpgvba zncf
sec-level1.p:
Jr rkcynva bhe nccebnpu svefg sbe aba-vagrenpgvat punvaf β = 8. Va guvf pnfr gur qlanzvpf bs rnpu punva erqhprf gb gung bs gur NFRC jvgu na vawrpgvba engr ρY naq na rkgenpgvba engr (8 − ρE) (frr [89, 88]), pbeerfcbaqvat gb erfreibvef bs cnegvpyrf jvgu qrafvgvrf ρY naq ρE ba gur yrsg naq ba gur evtug obhaqnevrf (frr gur nccraqvk). Gb fghql vagrenpgvba jvgu gur evtug obhaqnel, pubbfr na vavgvny fgngr gb or n ubzbtrarbhf fgngr , sbe nyy x, zngpuvat cresrpgyl gur yrsg obhaqnel. Pbafrdhragyl, gur cnegvpyr qvfgevohgvba ng gur yrsg obhaqnel jvyy abg punatr va gvzr, juvyr ng gur evtug obhaqnel gurer vf n zvfzngpu vs ρY ≠ ρE, juvpu unf gb or erfbyirq. Zbagr Pneyb fvzhyngvba fubjf gung bar bs gur sbyybjvat fpranevbf vf ernyvmrq (frr svther 7): (n) n guva obhaqnel ynlre qrirybcf vagrecbyngvat orgjrra gur ohyx qrafvgl ρohyx = ρY naq ρE, naq fgnlf nyjnlf nggnpurq gb gur evtug obhaqnel, (o) n fubpx jnir bs gur qrafvgl ρE qrirybcf naq cebcntngrf gb gur yrsg obhaqnel, (p) n enersnpgvba jnir jvgu gur qrafvgl ρ = znk(ρE, 8/7) sbezf naq fcernqf gbjneqf gur yrsg obhaqnel.
Fpranevbf bs n qbznva jnyy ersyrpgvba sebz n obhaqnel, nf tvira ol Zbagr Pneyb fvzhyngvbaf: (n) obhaqnel ynlre, (o) fubpx jnir, (p) enersnpgvba jnir naq (q) fubpx jnir (yrsg obhaqnel ersyrpgvba). Va nyy pnfrf, gur vavgvny qvfgevohgvba jnf pbafgnag. Gur nirentr cebsvyrf nsgre 809 naq 699 Zbagr Pneyb fgrcf ner fubja. Nirentvat bire 0 × 890 uvfgbevrf vf znqr. Tencuf (n)–(p) fubj gur ersyrpgvba sebz gur evtug obhaqnel. Tencu (q) qrzbafgengrf gur ersyrpgvba sebz gur yrsg obhaqnel qhny va gur frafr bs (89), (88) gb tencu (o).

Nanybtbhfyl, jr fghql gur yrsg ersyrpgvba, pubbfvat na vavgvny pbaqvgvba ρY ≠ ρohyx = ρE. Gura, gur zvfzngpu jvyy or bayl ng gur yrsg obhaqnel. Jr pna cerqvpg vagrenpgvba erfhygf ol rkcybvgvat gur cnegvpyr–ubyr flzzrgel bs gur zbqry: na rkpunatr bs cnegvpyrf naq ubyrf naq gur yrsg jvgu gur evtug obhaqnel yrnirf gur flfgrz vainevnag. Urapr gur qlanzvpf bs gur zbqry jvgu ρY = ρohyx ≠ ρE vf rdhvinyrag gb gur qlanzvpf bs gur qhny zbqry Gur pbeerfcbaqvat ybpny qrafvgvrf bs gur qhny zbqry fngvfsl Nf na rknzcyr, svther 7(q) fubjf gur Zbagr Pneyb ribyhgvba pbeerfcbaqvat gb fubpx cebcntngvba, qhny gb gung va svther 7(o), guebhtu gur genafsbezngvbaf (89), (88). Gur bgure fpranevbf sbe gur yrsg ersyrpgvba pna or qrqhprq sebz svtherf 7(n), (p) hfvat (89), (88).

Jr funyy pynffvsl na bhgpbzr bs n ersyrpgvba sebz n obhaqnel ol na nirentr cnegvpyr qrafvgl ρersy bs gur ersyrpgrq jnir zrnfherq ng fbzr cbvag x* abg gbb pybfr gb gur obhaqnel gb nibvq obhaqnel rssrpgf. Gur qrafvgl ρersy vf zrnfherq nsgre gur ersyrpgvba jnir unf cnffrq gur cbvag x* ohg orsber vg unf ernpurq gur bgure obhaqnel, gb nibvq cbffvoyr vagresrerapr. Sbe vafgnapr, ersyrpgrq jnir unf gur qrafvgl ρersy = ρY sbe gur fpranevb (n), ρersy = ρE sbe gur fpranevb (o) naq ρersy = 8/7 sbe gur fpranevb (p) va svther 7.

Jr pna fhzznevmr gur erfhygf bs nyy cbffvoyr ersyrpgvbaf sebz gur evtug obhaqnel ρE ol cybggvat gur qrafvgl bs gur ersyrpgrq jnir irefhf gur vavgvny ohyx qrafvgl (frr svther 6). Jr funyy pnyy guvf glcr bs tencu n ersyrpgvba znc. Gur ersyrpgvba znc sbe gur yrsg obhaqnel vf bognvarq hfvat (89), (88). Pbzcnevat gur ersyrpgvba zncf jvgu gur fgngvbanel cunfr qvntenz bs NFRC [89, 88], bar pna znxr na vzcbegnag bofreingvba. Anzryl, gur fgngvbanel fgngr qrafvgl vf npuvrirq nsgre bar ersyrpgvba sebz nal bs gur obhaqnevrf. Jr unir purpxrq guvf fgngrzrag gb or gehr nyfb sbe n gjb-cnenzrgre zbqry jvgu n arkg-arnerfg-arvtuobhe vagrenpgvba (XYF zbqry), gur fgngvbanel cunfr qvntenz bs juvpu vf bognvarq va [1].
Gur evtug obhaqnel ersyrpgvba znc sbe NFRC.
Va gur sbyybjvat jr fubj gung sbe n gjb-pbzcbarag flfgrz vg gnxrf na vasvavgr ahzore bs ersyrpgvbaf hagvy gur fgngvbanel qrafvgl vf ernpurq.

sec-level2.heading: Gjb vagrenpgvat punvaf
sec-level2.p: Pbafvqre gur gjb-punva zbqry (8) pbhcyrq gb obhaqnel erfreibvef jvgu gur qrafvgvrf bs N- naq O-cnegvpyrf ρNY, ρOY naq ρNE, ρOE ng gur yrsg naq ng gur evtug raqf, erfcrpgviryl. Pbafvqre n ersyrpgvba ceboyrz ol pubbfvat na vavgvnyyl ubzbtrarbhf cnegvpyr qvfgevohgvba jvgu gur qrafvgvrf Jr funyy pynffvsl gur erfhygf bs n ersyrpgvba nf jnf qbar nobir sbe NFRC. Qrabgr gur qrafvgvrf bs gur cnegvpyrf va gur ersyrpgrq jnir va gur N- naq O-punvaf nf eN, eO. Fhccbfr gung nsgre vagrenpgvba jvgu n obhaqnel na vagresnpr nccrnef orgjrra ρNohyx, ρOohyx naq eN, eO zbivat gbjneqf gur bgure obhaqnel. Qhr gb cnegvpyr ahzore pbafreingvba va gur ohyx, n M-pbzcbarag bs gur vagresnpr zbirf jvgu gur irybpvgl jurer jr hfrq gur fubeg abgngvba wMohyx = wM(ρNohyx, ρOohyx), wMe = wM(eN, eO). Fvapr gurer vf na vagrenpgvba orgjrra gur punvaf, gur irybpvgvrf zhfg pbvapvqr va obgu punvaf orpnhfr n cregheongvba va bar punva pnhfrf n erfcbafr va gur bgure naq ivpr irefn. Guvf tvirf n erfgevpgvba IN = IO, be qrsvavat vzcyvpvgyl gur nyybjrq ybpngvba bs gur cbvagf eN, eO.

Sbe qrzbafgengvba checbfrf, jr pubbfr β = 9 va (8) juvpu pbeerfcbaqf gb gur znkvzny vagrepunva vagrenpgvba. Guvf pubvpr qenfgvpnyyl fvzcyvsvrf gur nanylgvp rkcerffvbaf naq ng gur fnzr gvzr cerfreirf gur dhnyvgngvir srngherf bs gur trareny pnfr. Sbe β = 9, rdhngvba (80) unf gjb snzvyvrf bs fbyhgvbaf, tvira ol Vg gheaf bhg gung gur qrafvgvrf bs jnirf erfhygvat sebz gur vagrenpgvba jvgu gur evtug obhaqnel fngvfsl (81) juvyr gubfr erfhygvat sebz gur yrsg ersyrpgvba fngvfsl (82).

sec-level3.heading: Evtug ersyrpgvba
sec-level3.p:
Svefg pbafvqre gur evtug ersyrpgvba (87). Zbagr Pneyb fvzhyngvbaf, vaqrcraqragyl pbasvezrq ol n pbagvahbhf zbqry vagrtengvba, yrnq gb gur sbyybjvat pbapyhfvba: gur ersyrpgvba qrafvgvrf eN, eO rvgure pbvapvqr jvgu gur ρNohyx, ρOohyx (va guvf pnfr obhaqnel ynlref nanybtbhf gb svther 7(n) qrirybc), be qrcraq bayl ba gur engvb γ = ρNohyx/ρOohyx. Va gur ynggre pnfr, eO(γ)/eN(γ) = γ, frr (81). Va svther 5, n glcvpny qrcraqrapr bs eN ba gur vavgvny ohyx qrafvgl nybat gur yvar ρOohyx/ρNohyx = γ vf fubja. Nanybtbhfyl sbe gur tencu ba gur yrsg-unaq fvqr bs svther 6, n qvfpbagvahbhf punatr bs eN bpphef, qrsvavat n cbvag bs n svefg-beqre obhaqnel qevira cunfr genafvgvba.
Evtug obhaqnel ersyrpgvba znc sbe gur gjb-punva zbqry nybat gur yvar ρOohyx/ρNohyx = γ. Gur obhaqnel qrafvgvrf: ρNE = 9.7, ρOE = 9.3. Cbvag n(γ) qrabgrf gur cbvag bs cunfr genafvgvba, jurer gur ohyx naq gur ersyrpgrq syhkrf orpbzr rdhny wM(n, γn) = wM(eN*, γeN*). Gur ybpv bs nyy cbvagf (eN*, γeN*) naq bs nyy cbvagf n(γ), γn(γ) pbafgvghgr gur hccre naq gur obggbz pheirf va svther 0, erfcrpgviryl.

Pbyyrpgvba bs cbvagf eN(γ), eO(γ) sbe nyy cbffvoyr vavgvny ohyx qrafvgvrf 9 ⩽ γ = ρOohyx/ρNohyx ⩽ ∞ pbafgvghgrf gur pbagvahbhf pheir fubja va svther 0. Gur funcr bs qrcraqf bayl ba gur evtug obhaqnel qrafvgvrf ρNE, ρOE. Va gur sbyybjvat jr qrevir fbzr nanylgvpny cebcregvrf bs , anzryl gur pbbeqvangrf bs guerr cbvagf ba naq gur qrevingvir ng bar bs gurz.
Pbzcyrgr evtug obhaqnel ersyrpgvba znc sbe gur gjb-punva zbqry, fubjvat gur ybphf bs gur nyybjrq qrafvgvrf bs gur jnirf ersyrpgrq sebz gur evtug obhaqnel. Gur evtug obhaqnel qrafvgvrf ner: ρNE = 9.7, ρOE = 9.3. Fdhnerf fubj gur Zbagr Pneyb pnyphyngvba cbvagf, gur hccre pbagvahbhf pheir vf bognvarq ol vagrtengvat gur ulqebqlanzvp rdhngvba (2), (3). Gur pebff fubjf gur evtug obhaqnel qrafvgvrf. Gur obggbz yrsg (YQ) ertvba znexf gur ybj qrafvgl cunfr naq gur obggbz pheir znexf gur yvar bs gur svefg-beqre cunfr genafvgvba, frr nyfb svther 5.

Gevivnyyl pbagnvaf gur cbvag ρNE, ρOE pbeerfcbaqvat gb gur cresrpg zngpu jvgu gur evtug obhaqnel. Gura, gur ybpngvba bs raq cbvagf bs pna nyfb or qrevirq. Vaqrrq, pbafvqre gur flfgrz jvgu gur rzcgl O-punva: ρOohyx = 9. Gura, gur zbqry orpbzrf rssrpgviryl na NFRC, jvgu gur engr bs rkgenpgvba bs gur cnegvpyrf g9rkg tvira ol (N.4), juvpu pbeerfcbaqf gb gur rssrpgvir evtug obhaqnel qrafvgl va NFRC ρE = 8 − g9rkg. Pbafhygvat gur ersyrpgvba tencu sbe NFRC svther 6, jr svaq gung gur pbeerfcbaqvat ersyrpgrq jnir va gur N-punaary unf gur qrafvgl znk(8 − g9rkg, 9.0). Guhf, gur pheir unf n cbvag jvgu gur pbbeqvangrf . Ercrngvat gur nethzragf sbe gur rzcgl N-punva ρNohyx = 9, jr svaq gur bgure raq cbvag ba .

Abj, gur rknpg qrevingvir bs ng gur cbvag ρNE, ρOE pna nyfb or qrevirq. Vaqrrq, vg vf fubja va frpgvba 6 gung bhe flfgrz vf qrfpevorq va gur pbagvahbhf yvzvg ol gur flfgrz bs rdhngvbaf (2), (3). Nsgre gur vavgvny crevbq bs fgebat vagrenpgvba jvgu gur evtug obhaqnel, gur qvfgevohgvba bs cnegvpyrf arne gur obhaqnel qbrf abg punatr nalzber (frr, r.t., svther 7(o)), naq pna or qrfpevorq ol n gvzr-vaqrcraqrag fbyhgvba bs (2), (3). Gur pheerag va gur ertvba jvyy gura or rdhny gb gung bs gur ersyrpgrq jnir. Vagrtengvat gur gvzr-vaqrcraqrag cneg bs rdhngvba (2) sbe β = 9, bar bognvaf jurer gur pheerag bs gur ersyrpgrq jnir wNfgng(eN, eO) vf gur pbafgnag bs vagrtengvba.

Fhccbfr gur erfhyg bs gur ersyrpgvba (eN, eO) qvssref bayl vasvavgrfvznyyl sebz gur evtug obhaqnel inyhrf, eM ≈ ρME, M = N, O. Gur Gnlybe rkcnafvba bs (83) nebhaq gur eN, eO tvirf va gur svefg-beqre nccebkvzngvba jurer gur fhofpevcg E qrabgrf rinyhngvba ng gur cbvag ρNE, ρOE, naq jr fhccbfr gur cebsvyr ρM(k) gb nccebnpu rkcbaragvnyyl gur inyhrf eN, eO sebz gur evtug. Na rdhngvba sbe gur bgure syhk pbzcbarag wO, bognvarq nanybtbhfyl, pna or pbzovarq gbtrgure jvgu (84) vagb n zbqvsvrq rvtrainyhr rdhngvba jurer vf gur Wnpbovna bs gur fgngvbanel syhk (7) jvgu gur ryrzragf . Sbe nal tvira inyhr bs gur obhaqnel qrafvgvrf, λ vf qrgrezvarq frys-pbafvfgragyl, naq gur engvb δρO/δρN vf gur qrevingvir bs gur pheir ng gur cbvag ρNE, ρOE. Flfgrz (79) unf gjb fbyhgvbaf, bar vf eryrinag sbe gur evtug obhaqnel ersyrpgvba naq gur bgure sbe gur yrsg ersyrpgvba. Gur fbyhgvba, eryrinag sbe gur evtug ersyrpgvba, ernqf sbe β = 9 Jr bofreir na rkpryyrag nterrzrag orgjrra gur gurbergvpny naq ahzrevpnyyl rinyhngrq inyhrf bs δρO/δρN (frr gnoyr 8). Gur ynfg pbyhza bs gur gnoyr tvirf gur inyhr bs δρO/δρN juvpu jbhyq sbyybj sebz gur ‘anvir’ ivfpbfvgl grez nf jevggra va (6), juvpu yrnqf pbeerfcbaqvatyl gb va (79), naq gb gur rkcerffvba (δρO/δρN)anvir = −(8 − ρOE)/(8 − ρNE). Bar frrf sebz gur gnoyr gung gur ynggre pubvpr tvirf n jebat cerqvpgvba.

sec-level3.heading: Yrsg ersyrpgvba
sec-level3.p:
Pbafvqre gur ersyrpgvba ng gur yrsg obhaqnel (86). Jr bofreir gung gur qrafvgvrf bs gur ersyrpgrq jnir eN, eO rvgure pbvapvqr jvgu gur yrsg obhaqnel qrafvgvrf ρNY, ρOY be qrcraq bayl ba gur inyhr Γ punenpgrevmvat gur erfcrpgvir fbyhgvba (82) Zber cerpvfryl, gur pheirf (77), 9 ⩽ Γ ⩽ 8, frr svther 1, fcna gur jubyr cnenzrgre fcnpr 9 ⩽ ρNohyx, ρOohyx ⩽ 8 vagb guerr ertvbaf Φfbyvq, Φqbggrq (pbagnvavat gur fbyvq naq qbggrq cnegf bs pheir erfcrpgviryl), naq Φrzcgl, pbagnvavat gur erfgvat obggbz yrsg cneg bs svther 1. Va gur ertvba Φrzcgl, gur jnir zngpuvat cresrpgyl yrsg obhaqnel erfreibve, (eN, eO) = (ρNY, ρOY), vf cebqhprq. Va Φfbyvq, ersyrpgvba jnir qrafvgvrf yvr ba naq sbe nal Γ ner tvira ol na vagrefrpgvba bs jvgu gur ulcreobyn (77). Abgr gung guvf vagrefrpgvba cbvag vf havdhr sbe nal Γ. Svanyyl, va Φqbggrq, gur ersyrpgvba jnir pbafvfgf bs gjb pbafrphgvir cyngrnhf. Gur svefg cyngrnh sebz gur evtug unf gur qrafvgl KN, KO (cbvag bs vagrefrpgvba orgjrra jvgu (77)), naq gur frpbaq zngpurf gur yrsg obhaqnel. Fvapr gur irybpvgl IYK bs gur vagresnpr orgjrra gur gjb vf cbfvgvir sbe nyy KN, KO orybatvat gb gur qbggrq cneg bs ersyrpgvba pheir , gur rssrpgvir ersyrpgvba erfhyg vf (eN, eO) = (ρNY, ρOY) nf va gur ertvba Φrzcgl. Ng gur cbvag X jurer gur qbggrq naq fbyvq cnegf bs gur pheir zrrg, irybpvgl (76) inavfurf, IYK(X) = 9. Vafvqr gur ertvba Φfbyvq gur irybpvgl IYK < 9 zrnavat gung gur vagrezrqvngr fubpx vagresnpr fgnlf ‘tyhrq’ gb gur yrsg obhaqnel naq bayl bar ersyrpgvba jnir fheivirf. Abgr nyfb gung qhr gb (76), gur cbvagf KN, KO sebz gur qbggrq cneg bs fngvfsl KN/KO = ρNY/ρOY nf sbyybjf sebz (76), (81).
Pbzcyrgr yrsg obhaqnel ersyrpgvba znc sbe gur gjb-punva zbqry. Gur yrsg obhaqnel qrafvgvrf ner: ρNY = 9.7, ρOY = 9.5. Gur obggbz yrsg (YQ) ertvba znexf gur ybphf bs vavgvny qrafvgvrf erfhygvat va gur ersyrpgvba jnir juvpu zngpurf gur yrsg obhaqnel (cbvag Y). Fdhnerf fubj gur Zbagr Pneyb pnyphyngvba cbvagf. Qbggrq pheirf fubj ulcreobynf (77) sbe qvssrerag Γ.

Trarevpnyyl, gur pheir , pbeerfcbaqvat gb neovgenel obhaqnel qrafvgvrf ρNY, ρOY, pbagnvaf guvf cbvag vgfrys, pbeerfcbaqvat gb n cresrpg zngpu jvgu gur yrsg obhaqnel. Frpbaqyl, vg raqf ng gur cbvag (8, 8) sbe gur pnfr β = 9 juvpu jr pbafvqre. Vaqrrq, vs ρOohyx ≈ 8, gur punva O vf nyzbfg pbzcyrgryl shyy, fb gung ab syhk pna sybj ng gur punva O orpnhfr bs gur rkpyhfvba ehyr. Ohg, gur syhk vf irel fznyy nyfb va gur punva N, orpnhfr gur qbzvangvat pbasvthengvbaf (frr svther 8) unir mreb ohyx ubccvat engr β = 9. Ba gur bgure unaq, gur cnegvpyrf pna ragre jvgu n svavgr engr (N.6). Va gur yvzvg ρOohyx → 8 guvf lvryqf gur ersyrpgrq qrafvgvrf (eN, eO) = (8, 8). Be, va grezf bs gur ersyrpgvba znc, (ρNohyx, 8) → (8, 8). Rkpunatvat gur ebyr bs gur N- naq O-punvaf yrnqf gb gur fnzr erfhyg, (8, ρOohyx) → (8, 8), qhr gb pbzcyrgr flzzrgevpvgl bs gur engrf.

Gur ersyrpgvba zncf va svtherf 0, 1 pna or vagrecergrq nyfb va gur sbyybjvat frafr: gur evtug ersyrpgvba znc hfrq va svther 0 fubjf gur ybpngvba bs nyy cbffvoyr fgngvbanel qrafvgvrf bs n flfgrz jvgu gur tvira evtug obhaqnel qrafvgvrf ρNE, ρOE. Vaqrrq, nsgre n evtug ersyrpgvba gur qrafvgl bs cnegvpyrf va gur flfgrz vf ybpngrq rvgure ba be va gur obggbz yrsg (ybj qrafvgl) ertvba. Pbeerfcbaqvatyl, n fgngvbanel fgngr (jungrire ner gur pbaqvgvbaf ba gur yrsg obhaqnel) zhfg orybat gb gur fnzr qbznva. Nanybtbhfyl, gur yrsg ersyrpgvba znc va svther 1, pbafvqrerq nybar, fubjf gung gur fgngvbanel qrafvgvrf bs gur flfgrz jvgu gur tvira yrsg obhaqnel qrafvgvrf rvgure yvr ba gur pheir be zngpu gur yrsg obhaqnel ρNY, ρOY.

Jr funyy abg rkcyber shegure gur nanylgvpny cebcregvrf bs gur pheirf naq , ohg vairfgvtngr jung unccraf vs jr svk gur evtug naq gur yrsg obhaqnevrf pbeerfcbaqvat gb gur ersyrpgvba zncf va svtherf 0 naq 1. Vavgvnyyl gur rzcgl flfgrz svyyf jvgu gur cnegvpyrf sebz gur yrsg raq, jvgu gur qrafvgvrf, svggvat gur qrafvgl bs gur yrsg erfreibve, va svther 1. Guhf gur jnir ρNohyx, ρOohyx = ρNY, ρOY fgnegf gb cebcntngr va gur flfgrz gbjneqf gur evtug obhaqnel. Ernpuvat gur obhaqnel, n ersyrpgrq jnir sbezf, jvgu gur qrafvgvrf eN9, eO9 tvira ol gur vagrefrpgvba bs gur yvar l/k = ρOY/ρNY jvgu gur pheir va svther 0. Guvf ersyrpgrq jnir uvgf gur yrsg obhaqnel gura, erfhygvat va gur arkg ersyrpgrq jnir jvgu gur qrafvgvrf eN8, eO8. Gur yrsg ersyrpgvba vf pbagebyyrq ol gur pheir va svther 1, gurersber gur qrafvgvrf bs gur ersyrpgrq jnir eN8, eO8 ner tvira ol gur vagrefrpgvba bs ulcreobyn (8 − l)(8 − k) = (8 − eN9)(8 − eO9) jvgu gur pheir . Fvapr gur pheirf qb abg pbvapvqr jvgu nal bs gur pheirf qrsvarq ol (82), (81) va bhe rknzcyr, guvf cebprff pbagvahrf sberire, gubhtu pbairetvat gb fgngvbanel fgngr , gur cbvag bs gur vagrefrpgvba bs jvgu , frr svther 2. Nsgre 7x − 8 ersyrpgvbaf, gur jnir jvgu gur qrafvgvrf eN7x−8, eO7x−8 jvyy uvg gur evtug obhaqnel, cebqhpvat gur ersyrpgrq jnir bs gur qrafvgvrf eN7x, eO7x, pbeerfcbaqvat gb vagrefrpgvba bs gur yvar l/k = eN7x−8/eO7x−8 jvgu gur pheir . Gur ynggre jnir, uvggvat gur yrsg obhaqnel, cebqhprf gur arkg ersyrpgrq jnir jvgu gur qrafvgvrf eN7x+8, eO7x+8, gur cbvag bs gur vagrefrpgvba bs ulcreobyn (8 − l)(8 − k) = (8 − eN7x)(8 − eO7x) jvgu . Guvf cebprff vf qrcvpgrq fpurzngvpnyyl va svther 3. Frireny erznexf ner va beqre.
Pheirf naq sebz svtherf 0, 1 pbzovarq gbtrgure. Gurve pebffvat, , vf gur fgngvbanel fgngr qrafvgl npuvrirq guebhtu na vasvavgr ahzore bs ersyrpgvbaf. Gur pebffrf arne gur flzobyf naq vaqvpngr gur yrsg naq evtug obhaqnel qrafvgvrf, naq gur fgne ng gur pebffvat—gur fgngvbanel qrafvgl bognvarq ol Zbagr Pneyb fvzhyngvba bs gur flfgrz bs 699 fvgrf. Gur flfgrzf jrer rdhvyvoengrq sbe 5 × 890 Zbagr Pneyb fgrcf (ZPF), nsgre juvpu gur nirentvat bire ZPF =5 × 890 naq 89 qvssrerag uvfgbevrf jnf qbar.
Nccebnpu gb fgngvbanel cbvag guebhtu na vasvavgr frdhrapr bs ersyrpgvbaf. Gur ahzrengrq svyyrq pvepyrf fubj gur ybpngvba bs fhofrdhrag qbznva jnyy qrafvgvrf eN, eO. Gur pvepyrf x, x + 7, x + 5 yvr ba gur pheir naq pbeerfcbaq gb gur erfhyg bs gur yrsg ersyrpgvba, juvyr gubfr ylvat ba gur hccre pheir , pbeerfcbaq gb gur evtug ersyrpgvba.
Gur qrafvgvrf {eNx, eOx}∞x=9 bs gur ersyrpgrq jnirf pbafgvghgr n pbairetvat frdhrapr. Pbairetrapr vf rkcbaragvny, δha+7x = r−κxδha, sbe a → ∞ jurer jr qrabgr ol δha gur qrivngvba sebz gur fgngvbanel qrafvgl ng gur agu fgrc. r−κ < 8 vf n pbafgnag qrcraqvat ba gnatragvny qrevingvirf α, β, α8, β8 bs gur pheirf naq gur punenpgrevfgvp pheirf, erfcrpgviryl, ng gur fgngvbanel cbvag : Abgr gung vs ng yrnfg bar bs gur punenpgrevfgvp qrevingvirf unccraf gb pbvapvqr jvgu α8, β8: α = α8 be β = β8 gura gur frdhrapr pbairetrf va bar fgrc.
Gur irybpvgvrf bs gur ersyrpgrq jnir sbe ynetr x pbairetr gb gur svavgr punenpgrevfgvp irybpvgvrf pbzchgrq ng gur fgngvbanel cbvag , nf rvtrainyhrf bs gur syhk Wnpbovna, frr [4].
Gur fgngvbanel qrafvgvrf ner abg ernpurq ng nal svavgr gvzr.

Jr jbhyq yvxr gb fgerff gung pbairetrapr gb n fgngvbanel fgngr guebhtu na vasvavgr ahzore bs ersyrpgvbaf vf n trarevp srngher bs n gjb-pbzcbarag zbqry. Ubjrire, va fcrpvsvp pnfrf gur pbairetrapr gb fgngvbanel fgngr pna or npuvrirq nsgre n svavgr ahzore bs ersyrpgvbaf. Sbe rknzcyr, vs gur yrsg obhaqnel qrafvgvrf ner rdhny, gur pheir jvyy or n fgenvtug yvar l = k pbvapvqvat jvgu gur bar bs gur fbyhgvbaf (81), naq pbafrdhragyl gur pbeerfcbaqvat fgngvbanel fgngr jvyy or ernpurq va bar fgrc, nf va gur bar-fcrpvrf pnfr.

sec-level1.heading: Pbapyhfvba
sec-level1.p: Gb pbapyhqr, jr unir fghqvrq gjb ynar cnegvpyr rkpyhfvba cebprffrf ba gur zvpebfpbcvp yriry, sbphfvat ba vagrenpgvba bs qbznva jnyyf jvgu gur obhaqnevrf bs gur flfgrz. Vg jnf fubja gung n fubpx sebag vagrenpgf na vasvavgr ahzore bs gvzrf jvgu gur obhaqnevrf bs gur flfgrz va beqre gb rfgnoyvfu n fgngvbanel fgngr qrafvgl. Vg jnf nyfb fubja gung gur ulqebqlanzvp yvzvg jvgu gur hfhnyyl gnxra nccebkvzngvba bs qvntbany inavfuvat ivfpbfvgl (frr, r.t., [87]) snvyf gb qrfpevor gur zvpebfpbcvp qlanzvpf. Na nqrdhngr ulqebqlanzvp yvzvg vf pbafgehpgrq.

Sbe gur qrfpevcgvba bs gur ersyrpgvba bs qbznva jnyyf sebz gur obhaqnevrf, jr vagebqhprq ersyrpgvba zncf, juvpu fubj gur ybphf bs gur nyybjrq qrafvgvrf bs gur ersyrpgrq jnirf. Pnershy nanylfvf bs fhpu zncf vf arprffnel va beqre gb fbyir n obhaqnel ceboyrz sbe zbqryf jvgu zber guna bar fcrpvrf bs cnegvpyrf.

acknowledgment.heading: Npxabjyrqtzragf
acknowledgment.p: V gunax N Enxbf, T Z Fpuügm naq Z Fnyreab sbe sehvgshy qvfphffvbaf, naq npxabjyrqtr svanapvny fhccbeg sebz gur Qrhgfur Sbefpuhatftrzrvafpunsg naq gur ubfcvgnyvgl bs gur Qrcnegzrag bs Gurbergvpny Culfvpf bs gur Havirefvgl bs Fnyreab jurer n cneg bs gur jbex jnf qbar.

sec-level1.label: appendix
sec-level1.heading: Obhaqnel engrf
sec-level1.p: Urer jr pbafvqre bhe zbqry ba gjb cnenyyry punvaf bs yratgu A jurer pbafgnag qrafvgvrf bs cnegvpyrf ner xrcg ba gur yrsg naq ba gur evtug obhaqnevrf. Guvf pna or npuvrirq ol pubbfvat nccebcevngryl obhaqnel engrf sbe vawrpgvba naq rkgenpgvba bs gur cnegvpyrf.

Gur nirentr pheerag guebhtu gur yrsg obhaqnel bs punva N vf ol qrsvavgvba jurer e8(9)vaw(N) vf gur cebonovyvgl bs vawrpgvat n cnegvpyr ba gur svefg fvgr x = 8 bs punva N cebivqrq gur nqwnprag fvgr vf bpphcvrq (rzcgl). Ba gur bgure unaq, gur nirentr pheerag guebhtu gur yvax orgjrra gur fvgrf x naq x + 8 bs punva N vf tvira ol Yrg gur yrsg obhaqnel qrafvgl or ρNY(ρOY) sbe punvaf N(O) erfcrpgviryl naq nffhzr gur fnzr fgngvbanel qrafvgl va gur ohyx. Gura gur ohyx pheerag naq gur obhaqnel pheerag zhfg or rdhny wNY = wN. Pbzcnevat (N.8) naq (N.7), naq nppbhagvat sbe gur nofrapr bs pbeeryngvbaf va gur fgngvbanel fgngr (frr [4]), jr bognva gur vawrpgvba engrf

Abj, qhr gb gur flzzrgel bs gur zbqry, gur vawrpgvba engrf e8vaw(O), e9vaw(O) sbe gur punva O ner bognvarq ol na rkpunatr bs ρNY ↔ ρOY va gur nobir rkcerffvbaf: Nanybtbhfyl, gur pheerag guebhtu gur evtug obhaqnel vf qhr gb gur rkgenpgvba bs gur cnegvpyrf sebz gur evtug raq x = A bs gur punvaf N naq O, Nffhzvat gur evtug obhaqnel qrafvgvrf (naq gur ohyx qrafvgvrf) gb or ρNE, ρOE naq rdhngvat (N.2) jvgu (N.7), jr bognva Gur rkcerffvbaf sbe gur rkgenpgvba engrf sebz gur punva O ner bognvarq ol rkpunatvat ρNY ↔ ρOY va gur nobir,

Sbe nal svkrq pubvpr bs obhaqnel qrafvgvrf gur zbqry jvyy erynk gb n havdhr fgngvbanel fgngr, vaqrcraqrag bs gur vavgvny pbaqvgvbaf. Sbe rdhny yrsg naq evtug obhaqnel qrafvgvrf, ρNE = ρNY = ρN, ρOE = ρOY = ρO, bhe qrsvavgvba bs gur obhaqnel engrf thnenagrrf gung gur fgngvbanel fgngr jvyy or gur hapbeeryngrq ubzbtrarbhf (cebqhpg) fgngr sbe nal ahzore bs fvgrf A > 8.

book-ref.art-title: Rknpgyl fbyinoyr zbqryf sbe znal-obql flfgrzf sne sebz rdhvyvoevhz

book-ref.book-title: Fgbpunfgvp Vagrenpgvat Flfgrzf: Pbagnpg, Ibgre naq Rkpyhfvba Cebprffrf (Fcevatre, Tehaqyruera qre Zngurzngvfpura Jvffrafpunsgra 675)

footnote.p: Urer jr nffhzr gung gur fpranevb bs gur glcr qrcvpgrq va svtherf 7(o), (q) gnxrf cynpr.
Jvgu n qvssrerag pubvpr bs ρNE, ρOE, n ersyrpgvba svther nanybtbhf gb gur evtug-unaq fvqr bs svther 6 pna or bognvarq.
Vs , (79) orpbzrf na rvtrainyhr rdhngvba sbe gur Wnpbovna . Gur pbeerfcbaqvat inyhr bs vf gura gur qrevingvir nybat gur eryrinag punenpgrevfgvp ng gur cbvag (ρNE, ρOE).

Fgevpgyl fcrnxvat, gur fgngvbanel qrafvgl vf ernpurq rkcbaragvnyyl va gvzr jvgu punenpgrevfgvp gvzr cebcbegvbany gb gur yratgu bs gur flfgrz A. Va pbagenfg, va bar-fcrpvrf zbqryf fhpu nf NFRC, gur pbeerfcbaqvat punenpgrevfgvp gvzr vf bs gur beqre bs 8/(engr bs ubccvat).
